text: The Pony Express is a 1907 American silent drama movie directed by Sidney OlcottTHE PONY EXPRESS and stars Sidney Olcott, Robert Vignola, and Joe Santley. ==Actors== * Sidney Olcott * Robert Vignola * Joe Santley * Fred Santley ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1907 movies Category:1900s drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Olcott
title: The Pony Express (1907 movie)
